content:
=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: Stock market holidays: Wall Street, Nikkei to Heng Seng - these bourses of global markets to remain shut for New Year
Source: LiveMint - Markets
Published: 2025-12-28 11:35
Related Stocks: General Market News
Categories: markets

Summary:
Back home, the Indian stock market will remain open for trading on both days, as per the NSE holiday calendar. This means that both BSE and NSE will witness a normal trading day on the New Year.

Sentiment: neutral
URL: https://www.livemint.com/market/stock-market-news/stock-market-holidays-wall-street-nikkei-to-heng-seng-these-bourses-of-global-markets-to-remain-shut-for-new-year-11766915835826.html
